column4: I am using ubuntu 9.04 64 bit. My sound suddenly stopped functioning. Any fix?
same here
lol
fixed ?
since the last HAL update?
probably. I don't remember exactly.
nope, not fixed, and no-one here seems to have any idea
what hardware you running, out of interest?
I'm on an Acer Aspire One here
if I attempt to un-mute my sound, my display turns on and off, fun times :P
intel p4 3ghz ht. 1gb ram. nvidia 8800 GTS 320 mb,
not likely a common hardware component then :)
Turn off and turn on ? Lol. That doesn't happen here.
What hardware you got ?
And it doesn't seem to be a hardware fault to me. I got XP on one of the partition. And I tested the sound there, it worked fine.
it's an Acer Aspire One, 1.6GHz Atom, 1.5GB RAM, Intel 945GSE Express graphics
hmm
not sure about the sound hardware
or if our problems are even related, hehe
yeh
does seem odd though
anyone here know how to roll back particular packages?
see if we can't test this stuff out?
ubuntu is recognizing my sound card.
